gurmukhi: ਅੰਗ ਭੰਗ ਪਰੇ ਕਹੂੰ ਸਰਬੰਗ ਸ੍ਰੋਨਤ ਪੂਰ || ੲੇਕ ੲੇਕ ਬਰੀ ਅਨੇਕਨ ਹੇਰਿ ਹੇਰਿ ਸੁ ਹੂਰ ||੧੮||
transliteration: An Bhan Dare Kahoon Saraban Sronat Poor|| Ek Ek Barianekan Her(i) Her(i) Su Hoor||18||
translation: Somewhere the limbless fighters and somewhere the complete bodies are immersed in blood; the warriors who had attained martyrdom, are wedding the heavenly damsels, after making search for them.18.

gurmukhi: ਚੳੁਰ ਚੀਰ ਰਥੀ ਰਥੋ ਤਮ ਬਾਜ ਰਾਜ ਅਨੰਤ || ਸ੍ਰੋਣ ਕੀ ਸਰਤਾ ੳੁਠੀ ਸੁ ਬਿਅੰਤ ਰੂਪ ਦੁਰੰਤ ||
transliteration: Chaur Cheer Rathiratho Tam Baaj Raaj Anant|| Sron Kisartaa Outhisu Biant Roop Durant||
translation: The garments, chariots, the chariot-riders and many horses are lying hither and thither and a dreadful stream of blood is flowing in the battlefield.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਜ ਬਾਜ ਕਟੇ ਕਹੂੰ ਗਜਰਾਜ ਤਾਜ ਅਨੇਕ || ੳੁਸਟਿ ਪੁਸਟਿ ਗਿਰੇ ਕਹੂੰ ਰਿਪ ਬਾਚੀਯੰ ਨਹੀ ੲੇਕ ||੧੯||
transliteration: Saaj Baaj Kate Kahoon Gadraaj Taaj Anek|| Ousttee Pousttee Gire Kahoon Rip Baacheeyan Nahiek||19||
translation: Somewhere the bedecked horses and elephants are lying chopped and somewhere there are heaps of warriors lying down; not a single enemy hath remained alive.19.

gurmukhi: ਛਾਡਿ ਛਾਡਿ ਚਲੇ ਤਹਾ ਨ੍ਰਿਪ ਸਾਜ ਬਾਜ ਅਨੰਤ || ਗਾਜ ਗਾਜ ਹਨੇ ਸਦਾ ਸਿਵ ਸੂਰਬੀਰ ਦੁਰੰਤ ||
transliteration: Chhaad(i) Chhaad(i) Chale Tahaa Nrip Saaj Baaj Anant|| Gad Gad Hane Sadaa Siv Soorbeer Durant||
translation: The kings have abandoned their bedecked horses and elephants and gone away and the god Shiva, shouting very loudly, hath destroyed the mighty warriors.

gurmukhi: ਭਾਜ ਭਾਜ ਚਲੇ ਹਠੀ ਹਥਿਅਾਰ ਹਾਥਿ ਬਿਸਾਰ || ਬਾਣ ਪਾਣ ਕਮਾਣ ਛਾਡਿ ਸੁ ਚਰਮ ਬਰਮ ਬਿਸਾਰ ||੨੦||
transliteration: Bhaaj Bhaaj Chale Hathihathiaar Haath(i) Bisaar|| Baan Paan Kamaan Chhaad(i) Su Charam Baram Bisaar||20||
translation: The brave fighters have also abandoned their weapons and gone away, after leaving behind their bows and arrows and steel-armors.20.

gurmukhi: ਜਿਤੇਕ ਸੂਰ ਧਾੲੀਯੰ || ਤਿਤੇਕ ਰੁਦ੍ਰ ਘਾੲੀਯੰ || ਜਿਤੇਕ ਅੳੁਰ ਧਾਵਹੀ ਤਿਤਯੋ ਮਹੇਸ ਘਾਵਹੀ ||੨੧||
transliteration: Jitek Soor Dhaaeeyan|| Titek Rudra Ghaaeeyan|| Jitek Aur Dhaav-hitityo Mahes Ghaav-hee||21||
translation: All the warriors who go in front of him, Rudra destroys them all, those who will advance, will also be destroyed by Shiva.21.

gurmukhi: ਕਮੰਧ ਅੰਧ ੳੁਠਹੀ || ਬਸੇਖ ਬਾਣ ਬੁਠਹੀ ||
transliteration: Kamanndh Andh Outh-hee|| Basekh Baan Bouth-hee||
translation: The blind (headless) trunks are rising in the battlefield and casting special showers of arrows.

gurmukhi: ਪਿਨਾਕ ਪਾਣ ਤੇ ਹਣੇ || ਅਨੰਤ ਸੂਰਮਾ ਬਣੇ ||੨੨||
transliteration: Pinaal Paan Te Hane|| Anant Soorma Bane||22||
translation: Innumerable warriors, shooting arrows from their bows are exhibiting proof of their bravery.22.

gurmukhi: ਸਿਲਹ ਸੰਜਿ ਸੱਜੇ || ਚਹੂੰ ਓਰ ਗੱਜੇ ||
transliteration: Silah Sanj(i) Sajje|| Chahoon Or Gadje||
translation: Bedecked with the steel-armour, the warriors are thundering on all the four sides.
